This module implements procs to work with the RefMultiSigAccount type and procs to call MultiSig Account move functionsnimble importsproject importsMultiSigTransaction helpersconstantsMultiSig signing based procsMultiSig account transaction procsMultiSig utils procsHelper procs for move MultiSigMultiSig move procs

Imports

utils, transaction, address, arguments, aptosclient, nodetypes, authenticator, signature, aptos_account, payload, moduleid

Types

Vote {.pure.} = enum
  Approve, Reject            ## approve should be sent as true and reject as false
